RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: cascassette@sinedub.io
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Change Edit Step with help of the LPB
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
This tool will add possible keybindings for setting the edit step to LPB, LPB/2, LPB/3, LPB*8 etc. It's recommended to also switch the shortcuts for "Jump 16 Rows Up/Down" and "Go To Next/Previous Line With Edit Step", too.
Cas Marrav 2012
